summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General transcription request form for audio recordings related to case number 2019010614. The form requests transcription of two interviews recorded on December 2, 2021, and includes approval from a supervisor named Ryan Geach. The document is administrative and does not contain substantive details about the Epstein case.

persons.name: Ryan Geach
persons.context: Digitally signed the transcription request form as the approving SAC/ASAC.

events.title: Audio Interviews Recorded
events.description: Two audio interviews were recorded, with lengths of 2 hours 50 minutes 30 seconds and 2 minutes 26 seconds, for transcription.

events.title: Transcription Request Submitted
events.description: A transcription request form was submitted to the DOJ OIG Investigations Division for audio recordings from case 2019010614.

keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG transcription request form for case number 2019010614.
Two audio interviews were recorded on December 2, 2021, for transcription.
The request was approved by supervisor Ryan Geach on December 3, 2021.
The form references Bureau of Prisons facilities and systems (MCC New York, FCC Forrest City, SENTRY, BOPWARE).
This is an administrative document showing ongoing investigative activity but contains no substantive case details.
